suppress.notes: file name: junit-4.13.1.jar reason: Fixed in junit-4.13.1 for applications running JDK 1.7 and later. We require Java 1.8 at a minimum, so we're good with regards to this CVE. See https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-15250.
file name: jdom2-2.0.6.jar reason: mitigated by https://github.com/Unidata/netcdf-java/pull/804
